  • smooth
  • View page source

smooth

pyrit.toolbox.PostprocessToolbox.smooth(points_on_line: ndarray, values: ndarray)

Smoothes unevenly spaced data using spline interpolation and a moving average filter.

Parameters

  • points_on_line (np.ndarray) – (N,2) or (N, 3) matrix with coordinates of the evaluated points.

  • values (np.ndarray) – (N,) Vector with the value of the component of the field at the evaluated points.

Returns

smoothed_values – Vector with the smoothed data.

Return type

np.ndarray

Raises

  • ValueError – ValueError if values does not have dimension (N,) or (N,1)

  • ValueError – ValueError if the numbers of points and values do not match.
